sql.sql:
select
    t.id,
    t.id_hi, 
    t.groupfl "groupFl", 
    t.code "code", 
    t.longname "name",
    p.code "parentCode"
from 
    (
        select distinct id, id_hi, groupfl, code, longname, arcfl, arestfl 
        from U_UZ_PURPCRED_112 t 
        start with t.ID=nvl(l_Pkgdeauniref.fGetClsRefValID(T_pkgDea.fDclId(:productCode,0), u_Pkguniref.fRefCode2Id('UZ_PURPCRED_112',0)),t.ID)
        connect by ID = PRIOR ID_HI
    ) t,
    U_UZ_PURPCRED_112 p
where t.id_hi=p.id(+)
    and t.arcfl='0' and t.arestfl='0'
    and (
        :parentCode is null and p.code is null
        or
        :parentCode is not null and p.code = :parentCode
    )
order by t.code
